stadium.name: Fletchings Field
stadium.description: Fletchings Field was the first formal Troll Ball stadium in Warden lands. The design balances wood and stone, with arrowhead motifs and banners representing each region under Warden protection. The field includes trees, gully's and other obstacle placements, changed each match by local druids and terrain crafters.

stats.pregame_ritual: Going over the game plan drawn in the dirt with the team captain.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Wearing their boots on the wrong feet during the warm-up.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Headbutting their own team's goal post (gently).
Sticking a specific type of feather in their helmet's plume.
Burying their helmet in the ground and then digging it back up.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Always putting on their left gauntlet before their right.

stadium.name: The Oakmaul Grounds
stadium.description: Built over the site of the final battle during the liberation of Hafting now rises The Oakmaul Grounds‚Äîpart arena, part monument. The central oak still bears the burn scars of the final battle. Troll ball here feels more like ritual than sport.

stats.pregame_ritual: Wiggling their fingers in a complex, magical-looking pattern.
Tying their bootlaces together and hopping to the starting line.
Attempting to communicate with birds.
Chewing a specific, bitter root said to improve night vision.
Plucking a single hair from a teammate's beard for luck.
Rubbing the Trollball on their armpits for 'grip'.
Organizing a small betting pool on who will score first.
Asking the Trollball for advice, and pretending to listen to its response.
Smelling their own game-worn socks from the previous match.
Anointing their forehead with morning dew.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.

preGame:
# üéôÔ∏è WELCOME TO FLETCHINGS FIELD, FOLKS! üéôÔ∏è

Greetings, heathens, gore-hounds, and sports fans from every plane of existence! This is Nok the Corrupter, coming to you live for another electrifying edition of **TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL!** We are broadcasting from the lovely Fletchings Field in Fletchings, a stadium that balances wood, stone, and the delightful promise of splinters! The local druids have shifted the terrain, probably to hide the bodies later, and the atmosphere is absolutely electric with the scent of impending violence! ü©∏üå≥

Tonight, we have a delicious fratricidal match-up! It‚Äôs a Warden civil war as **The Greenwatch** travel to face their brethren in **Oak & Onslaught**! Oh, I simply *love* it when the "good guys" beat each other senseless. Sir Randy with his FANCY bow and Falric the coin-counter must be sweating in their boots watching their precious protectors square off! Will they hug it out? NO! They‚Äôre going to smash each other with kirkhammers! üèπüí∞

Let's look at the locker room insanity! **Madea Mensch** of The Greenwatch is currently tying his bootlaces together and hopping around... is this a tactical handicap or just stupidity? I love it! Meanwhile, **Wynnie Faina** for the home team is wearing his boots on the wrong feet! It's a battle of podiatric terrible decisions! And listen to that‚Äî**Milt Casady** is leading Oak & Onslaught in a chant that‚Äôs getting louder and louder! It sounds like a war cry, or perhaps a menu order! Who cares! Grab your popcorn and hide your kids, because it‚Äôs time for **TROLLBAAAALLL!** üëπüèà
postGame:
# ü©∏ THE GREENWATCH OUTLAST THE ONSLAUGHT! ü©∏

What a spectacle! What a massacre! The dust has settled at Fletchings Field, and the **Greenwatch** have emerged victorious over **Oak & Onslaught** with a final score of **3 to 2**! It was a close one, folks, tighter than Governor-King Zenku's mask, but the visitors managed to claw their way to victory through a haze of bruises and broken dreams! Let‚Äôs break down the carnage! ü¶¥

The game started with **Goldenberg Rimola** of the Greenwatch acting like a possessed gazelle, snatching that leather troll head and sprinting into enemy territory! But the violence started early! **Ema Ulrick**, wielding a Cutlass like a butcher late for a shift, absolutely flattened Rese Halpern! A beautiful start to the hostilities! 

The Greenwatch didn‚Äôt let the blood loss slow them down, though. **Troy Jorgan**, who I‚Äôm told takes advice from the ball itself‚Äîmaybe it told him to duck?‚Äîslipped past the defense and launched a massive shot from the 2-point zone! **GOAL!** Two points for the Greenwatch right out of the gate! But the celebration was cut short immediately! üí•

In a display of pure spite‚Äîmy favorite emotion‚Äî**Wynnie Faina** of Oak & Onslaught marched up to the scorer, Troy Jorgan, and smashed him out of play with a Mace! You score on us? We break your ribs! That‚Äôs the Trollball spirit! The Healers were working overtime in the first half, folks. Ahron Latashia and Nariko Javed were practically running laps dragging bodies back onto the field! üöë

Then, we saw the highlight of the half! A **DOUBLE KNOCKOUT!** Abner Seidel and Troy Jorgan clashed in the center, Talwar meeting Kirkhammer, and BOTH went down in a heap! Neither man standing! It was poetic! It was beautiful! It was exactly what I pay to see! The half ended with the Greenwatch up 2-0, and the crowd thirsting for more! ‚öîÔ∏è

Coming out of Halftime, **Nobe Haukom** decided he hadn‚Äôt hurt enough people yet. He picked up the ball and immediately introduced **Symer Crissy** to the business end of a Mallet! WHACK! With the path cleared, he launched a pass to **Madea Mensch**, who hopped his way past Milt Casady and walked it in for a **TOUCHDOWN!** That put the Greenwatch up 3-0! ü¶∂

But Oak & Onslaught weren't dead yet! Or, well, they were brought back to life by their healer, so they literally weren't dead! **Symer Crissy**, fresh off the revival bench, decided to write her own hero story. After a frantic scramble and some brutal fighting involving Goldenberg Rimola crushing Normi Glaudia, Crissy found herself with the ball in the 2-point zone. She launched it... and **SCORED!** Two points for the home team! The gap narrowed to 3-2! üìà

The tension was palpable! Oak & Onslaught had the momentum! Symer Crissy tried to connect with Milt Casady, but the Greenwatch defense was too thick! And then, the chaos reached its peak. **Wynnie Faina** and **Darin Berliner** collided in a shower of sparks and violence‚Äîanother **DOUBLE KNOCKOUT!** A Mace to the face and a Bardiche to the... well, everywhere! Both players hit the dirt! üíÄüíÄ

In the final moments, **Darin Berliner**, miraculously returned to the field by Nariko Javed, snatched the ball in the away zone. With seconds ticking down, Wynnie Faina tried to stop her, but Darin slipped through like a greasy eel! She held onto possession as time expired! 

And that's the game! **The Greenwatch wins 3-2!** A valiant effort by Oak & Onslaught, but they just couldn't stop the bleeding‚Äîliterally! I bet Sir Randy is crying into his herbal tea right now, while Falric tries to calculate the deductibles on all those injuries! This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off and reminding you: If you can't win, make sure the other guy can't walk! Goodnight, Osterra! üåôüëπ
